title: Wake 'n' Shake
detail: Many people feel tired in the morning, and today’s alarm clocks are too forgiving about letting people sleep in. Our new and improved alarm clock fixes this issue by making snoozing a challenge, requiring the user to get out of bed and complete a customizable task for the device to turn off. Not only does this motivate users to get up, but it also provides a healthy, daily dose of mental and physical stimulation that everyone could benefit from!
